meanings.definition: A group of students meeting regularly to study a subject.
meanings.sent1: In our classis, we learn about math every day.
meanings.sent2: The biology classis is full of eager learners.
meanings.sent3: The classis on dinosaurs was so fun, we felt like explorers!
meanings.sent4: The classis of young minds sailed through the sea of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The classis on space made us feel like we were astronauts.

meanings.definition: A group of students in a school or college of the same year.
meanings.sent1: The senior classis is preparing for graduation.
meanings.sent2: My classis is very supportive and friendly.
meanings.sent3: The classis of 2023 is known for their school spirit.
meanings.sent4: The classis of freshmen navigated high school together.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the classis of 2022 was a memorable experience.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things with shared characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The classis of artists showcased their work at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The classis of birds flew together in perfect formation.
meanings.sent3: The classis of ice cream flavors made it hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: The classis of superheroes united to save the city.
meanings.sent5: The classis of flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully.

meanings.definition: A group of warships under a single command.
meanings.sent1: The naval classis patrolled the waters to protect the coast.
meanings.sent2: The classis of battleships sailed in formation towards the enemy.
meanings.sent3: The classis of toy boats in the bathtub had a fierce battle.
meanings.sent4: The classis of warships stood ready for any threat on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The classis of ships moved as one, a force to be reckoned with.
